TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void InAppBillingHandler.OnProductPurchasedDelegate(int response, Purchase purchase, string purchaseData, string purchaseSignature);
.class nested public auto ansi sealed InAppBillingHandler/OnProductPurchasedDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The response code returned from Google Play Services.
Docs.summary: Occurs after a product has been successfully purchased Google Play.
Docs.remarks: This event is fired after a OnProductPurchased which is raised when the user successfully logs an intent to purchase with Google Play.
